alert.note: Alert for Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 8:58PM CDT until May 12 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Richardson County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 857 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Rulo, or 9 miles northeast of Hiawatha, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Richardson County, including the following locations... Preston, Sac and Fox Nation Reservation and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
